comments: Has often appeared in reference works as Edouard Fiacre Louis Raoul in error, see also Edouard Francois Armand Raoul (1845-1898). Sometimes published as 'M. Raoul', M. standing for Monsieur.
examples: Author of Choix des plantes de la Nouvelle-Zelande (1846). Mycological example: Ileodictyon Tul. ex Raoul in Ann. Sci. Nat. Bot., ser. 3, 2: 114 (1844).
source: from R.E.G.Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991. New Zealand J. Bot., 14: 199-202 (1976).
